predictions.prediction: The announcement of new U.S. tariffs set for April 2, 2025, will lead to increased market volatility and inflation concerns. This is likely to result in a 5% increase in the volatility index (VIX) within the next two weeks.
The weaker-than-expected U.S. jobs report will lead to a 0.5% decrease in the S&P 500 index within the next week as investors adjust
